    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BlackjackController
    This is the controller class that uses all of the functionality in the model.
    BlackjackInstance
    This is a class used for saving and loading, and it is an instance of a Blackjack game
    BlackjackModel
    This class contains the game logic for a Blackjack game
    BlackjackView
    This class represents what is needed to display the Blackjack game in the GUI
    BoardGamesView
    Creates and presents main menu GUI which allows for game selection
    BoardSquare
     
    Card
    This class represents an individual card
    CardView
    This class represents the display of card images
    CheckersController
     
    CheckersInstance
     
    CheckersModel
     
    CheckersView
     
    Connect4Controller
    This class defines methods to call the model class to execute game commands, connecting the view with the model.
    Connect4Instance
    This class defines methods that allow saving/loading a Connect4 and getters for the game board and a player's turn.
    Connect4Model
    This class defines methods to handle game logic, including making moves, updating the game board, and checking for game-over conditions.
    Connect4View
    This class creates a GUI for the user to interact with, following the functions of a Connect4 game.
    Deck
    This class represents a deck of cards
    Hand
    This class represents a hand for an individual player or the dealer.
    PlayerNamingScreen
    Creates a GUI which allows the user's to type a name they want
    ScoreUpdate
    This class is the object passed to observers when a score is recorded.
    SuperAwesomeGames
    Launches the main menu view which portrays all games which can be selected
    YahtzeeCategory
    This enum represents the different scoring categories in Yahtzee and provides methods to calculate the score for each category based on the dice rolled.
    YahtzeeController
    This class defines methods to interact with the Yahtzee model, serving as the controller in the MVC design.
    YahtzeeDie
    This class represents a single die in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeInstance
    This class represents a saved instance of a Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeModel
    This class manages the game state for the Yahtzee game, serving as the model in the MVC design.
    YahtzeePlayer
    This class represents a player in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeScorecard
    This class represents a player's scorecard in the Yahtzee game.
    YahtzeeView
    This class represents the view component of the Yahtzee game.
